ygData.subject: RE: Bard envy
ygData.msgSnippet: It has been pstulated that Lambent Stones may not be No Drop since several different classes can use them for quests.  Shada you have had these apparently,
ygData.messageBody:
It has been pstulated that Lambent Stones may not be No Drop since several
different classes can use them for quests. Shada you have had these
apparently, care to weigh in?

Kitasi

-----Original Message-----
From: Renee Cole [mailto:nat_ive@...]
Sent: Thursday, October 14, 1999 10:20 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Bard envy


From: "Renee Cole" <nat_ive@...>


> >> Yep, it's true. Rangers and Rogues in particular are complaining up a
>storm about how good the
> >> bard armour is compared to theirs.
>Rogues I can understand, but Rangers!?! I don't mean to gripe (well, yes I
>do ;p ), but have any of them taken a look at the armor and 1H Slash lists
>at Allakhazam's site? Just go by and look at all the nifty Ranger-only
>items there. Gosh, let's see... how many bard-only weapons are listed
>there? NONE :oP Bard only armor (pre-patch) 1, and that's from PoF.
>Ranger's have no room to gripe. Period. (IMO)

I spent my evening last night with my druid taxiing a ranger friend around
so he could get his new armor. He got both bracers and the sleeves. I saw
the stats for these pieces myself. On the bracers and sleeves, AC and
weight are the same as rubicite (which is what he was replacing) plus stat
bonuses. The ivy etched armor is VERY nice stat-wise (I don't like how it
looks though).

Although it appears that Verant forgot to add boots and pants for the
rangers, the rest of the gear is nothing to complain about. I suppose those

that are complaining are the ones that would gripe regardless.

As to the question on lambent stones, I saw one being auctioned last night
in Kithicor. (this was on Povar) I was a bit sceptical, since my
understanding is that the components needed for these quests are all no
drop/lore. Nary a hg or griffon did I see all evening while we ran all over

Norrath and back. I am hoping lambent stones don't turn out to be a rare
item.

-Treehugger and Songmaker

Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to toren@... with
the subject lol.
